item.description:
We're sticking with Monday in Porter Square, at Christopher's.
On the agenda: * Wikiconference New York -- great discussions there about local and US chapters, outreach, and huggle. * Wiki-intros at local universities and libraries -- follow up with Tufts from last month and the classics dept that's asking its PhD candidates to help put 30,000 items onto Wikisource. * Buenos Aires : how can we help wikis do argentina right, who is going, and what will the remote feeds be like? *
SJ 617 529 4266
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a black Wikimania shirt on, at a table upstairs.
item.name: BA or Bust!
